## DateFormatPipe.transform() method

Formats provided date into formatted string

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
transform(value: TDate | DateValue, format?: string | keyof FormatProvider, parseFormat?: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | TDate \| [DateValue](./datetime.datevalue.md) | value to be transformed |
|  format | string \| keyof [FormatProvider](./datetime.formatprovider.md) | Format that is used for formatting, can be also 'FormatProvider' key |
|  parseFormat | string | format used for parsing string date |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
